DOC.brief_summary: This study test effect self-affirmation manipulation ( ) acceptance health message detail risk alcohol consumption , ( ii ) engagement health message ( iii ) alcohol consumption 7-day follow-up . Half participant complete self-affirmation manipulation , reflect important value , whereas half complete control equivalent , reflect least important value . Immediately post-intervention , participant receive information risk alcohol consumption complete measure message acceptance engagement material . Seven day intervention , participant self-report alcohol consumption previous 7 day .
DOC.brief_title: Exploring Whether Self-affirmation Promotes Reduced Alcohol Consumption Response Narrative Health Information
